attractions.name: Springfield Botanical Gardens
attractions.description: A beautiful 20-acre garden featuring themed gardens, walking trails, and seasonal flower displays.

attractions.name: Lincoln Presidential Library
attractions.description: Explore exhibits about Abraham Lincoln's life and presidency in this world-class museum.

attractions.name: Washington Park
attractions.address: 1501 S Grand Ave W, Springfield, IL 62704
attractions.description: A 150-acre park featuring a lake, playgrounds, picnic areas, and the Thomas Rees Memorial Carillon.

attractions.name: Dana-Thomas House
attractions.description: Frank Lloyd Wright's 1902 masterpiece featuring over 100 pieces of original Wright furniture.

attractions.name: Illinois State Museum
attractions.description: Exhibits on Illinois' natural and cultural history, including fossils, Native American artifacts, and art.

attractions.name: Knight's Action Park
attractions.description: Family entertainment center with water park, go-karts, mini-golf, batting cages, and arcade.

attractions.name: Henson Robinson Zoo
attractions.address: 1100 E Lake Shore Dr, Springfield, IL 62712
attractions.description: Home to over 300 animals representing 90 species from around the world in naturalistic habitats.

attractions.name: Old State Capitol
attractions.address: 1 Old State Capitol Plaza, Springfield, IL 62701
attractions.description: Historic site where Lincoln served as a legislator and delivered his famous 'House Divided' speech.
